nodes.label: Draw animals in their habitats with labels (e.g., fish in water).
Hand-drawn fish in a blue pond labeled 'fish' and 'water'
Brown deer next to green trees labeled 'deer' and 'grass'
Gray rabbit near brown bushes labeled 'rabbit' and 'hiding'
Fish correctly labeled in its aquatic habitat
Deer correctly labeled with grass and trees, showing appropriate understanding
Rabbit labeled 'hiding' near bushes; incomplete understanding of habitat
Include 'bushes' or 'forest' as part of the rabbit's habitat
Missing labels for resources like 'air' or 'sunlight'
Ensure all resources necessary for animal survival are labeled
